statements: SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_credentials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_credentials ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, salt FROM user_credentials WHERE salt is not null;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT id, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT * FROM user_credentials ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, salt FROM user_credentials WHERE id IN (2, 5, 8)
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id < 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_id FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id >= 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = user_role_permissions.role_id JOIN user_permissions ON user_permissions.permission_id = user_role_permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 'b18743f7-8e01-4bc4-b871-3490f96fdcc5';
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT ur.role_name, up.permission_name FROM user_roles ur JOIN user_role_permissions urp ON ur.role_id = urp.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON urp.permission_id = up.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username, COUNT(*) AS num_permissions FROM users u JOIN user_role_permissions urp ON u.user_id = urp.role_id GROUP BY user_id, username ORDER BY num_permissions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles_mapping ORDER BY user_id ASC, role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_time FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash, salt FROM user_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN user_roles_mapping ON user_roles.role_id = user_roles_mapping.role_id;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY activity_time DESC;
